Detailed Description

template<class Base>
class istd::TCachedUpdateManagerWrap< Base >

Help wrapper class supporting of cached parts.

If nested update is started, base class implementation of BeginChanges and EndChanges will be blocked.

Member Function Documentation

template<class Base >
bool istd::TCachedUpdateManagerWrap< Base >::CalculateCache ( int  changeFlags) [inline, protected, virtual]

Calculate cache.

It will be called, if cache was not valid and EnsureCacheValid() is called. Default implementation does nothing and is provided to ensure that base class for all derived classes implement this method.

Reimplemented in imath::TFulcrumGridFunctionBase< Argument, Result, Fulcrums >, and iimg::CReflectedBitmapBase.

Definition at line 89 of file TCachedUpdateManagerWrap.h.

template<class Base >
bool istd::TCachedUpdateManagerWrap< Base >::EnsureCacheValid ( ) const [inline, protected]

Ensures cache is valid.

If cache is not valid method CalculateCache will be called to update it.

Definition at line 59 of file TCachedUpdateManagerWrap.h.

template<class Base >
void istd::TCachedUpdateManagerWrap< Base >::InvalidateCache ( int  changeFlags = 0) [protected]

Make cache invalid.

This is automatically done when model/observer mechanism is used.
